Reviews.Title: The whole kit is awesome!!!
Reviews.Author: Daiana Leandro
Reviews.Content: It's a big deal for a good priece, everything is as good as I was expecting. Fast delivery! I love the câmera and all settings.

Reviews.Title: Nikon COOLPIX L820
Reviews.Author: Shopper2011
Reviews.Content: Everything was perfect except battery charger did not seem to work. I love the camera and all other accessories were great.

Reviews.Title: like it
Reviews.Author: cheryl hubbert
Reviews.Content: I like the camera, took me awhile to get used to not doing point and shoot.  The instructions on the dvd were very good and I have been using them to practice different scenes.  I sent the first camera back but later figured out it was me not the camera. The company I sent back to was very prompt returning a new camera to me.  The bundle I received was awesome for the price. Very glad I purchased.

Reviews.Title: Great purchase, Amazing Deal
Reviews.Author: PhilGM
Reviews.Content: I have been looking for a DSLR-type camera for the past couple of years to assist my career in writing.  I saw many stores putting this particular camera on sale and thought before I went to a store, I would check Amazon out to see what deal they may have.  In the end, this package along with the price was too good to pass up.  The shipping was quick, the packaging was good and all the items are being put to use.I was able to put the camera in action almost immediately at a motor sports event and it passed every test, outside of the puny clips that are supposed to hold the strap in place.  However, a couple of good knots solved that problem.  Considering I only had a few minutes with the camera before putting it to use, I got great photos that were used for stories.The camera is friendly for both novice and pro users and I am glad I was able to finally purchase a camera like this.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful camera. Not everything pictured was received.
Reviews.Author: Cinnamon Hollow
Reviews.Content: I am a complete and total camera newbie so I can't give any major technical reviews here but I can give my point opinion of the photos i've taken.I'm giving this product 4 stars because not everything was as pictured. For the battery charger, I received a smaller charger that didn't have the car charger with it. So it's not as pictured.For the camera, though, I am very pleased. t is very easy to use for a beginner and has many features. I was able to start taking pictures right away and the are all crisp and clear. I am a blogger so I need photos to emphasize my posts and the Nikon Coolpix L820 gives me exactly what I need. I was originally looking for a DSLR but soon realized they are a bit more advanced than I am ready for. So this bridge camera was the right choice.I like that I can take up close photos, landscape shots when we are traveling, panoramic photos, portrait shots and even sports shots. There is even an option that lets the camera sense when someone smiles and automatically snap the photo!I also love that  can take 1080mp video for vlog posts and family events. I do wish it had the ability to use an external mic though. I forgot to check that before purchasing and it would have been the only thing that would have possibly made me look for something else.A viewer would be great but I do just fine looking at the 3" LCD screen and actually use it more on point and shoot cameras anyway since I get a better view of what I'm looking at.The lens cap does connect directly to the lens housing and not on the lens itself so remember to remove it before turning your camera or the lens can't extend and you will get an error on the screen. The lens extends automatically when you turn the camera on. On a plus side, this is one way of making sure you don't forget to take the cap off before shooting photos! :0)The included software makes uploading you photos to your computer very easy. It works better than most included software and has many options included for your photos.Everything included int he kit makes it well worth the price. Even though I didn't receive the batter charger pictured, the one I got is just fine.Overall I'd say this is a really great purchase. I am very happy with the camera and the quality of photos and can't wait to take it on vacation and get some travel blog posts and vlog posts created with it!

Reviews.Title: As advertised
Reviews.Author: Anastacio Leal Jr
Reviews.Content: I chose a 5 star because I recieved exactly what I ordered and it was on time. My wife and I are very happy with the purchase. I would recommend this camera to friends and family.

Reviews.Title: Great Deal
Reviews.Author: rocco1
Reviews.Content: The camera is great and had high marks in Consume Reports. I was surprised with the quantity and quality of item includedhe accessories package. Very please with Focus Camera.

Reviews.Title: I like the camera, but it does not have a viewfinder. This makes it difficult to view image in bright lite condition
Reviews.Author: Chi "Chi Kelley"
Reviews.Content: I like the camera, but it does not have a viewfinder. This makes it difficult to view image in bright lite condition

Reviews.Title: bundle items
Reviews.Author: Emory L. Shirey
Reviews.Content: both tripods are bad quality and the bag barely holds the xtra batteries and the other necessary items.the camera seems great,, although only used a few times

Reviews.Title: Awesome Camera but bundle needs tweeking
Reviews.Author: GERALD
Reviews.Content: Would have given this 5 stars except Focus Camera, vender for this camera bundle, put the wrong HDMI cable in the package. This camera takes the "Micro" HDMI cable end, not the "Mini" end, to plug into the camera port. You would think a camera store would realize this and put the correct cable in the bundle. I'm not the only one that had this problem as I saw in reviews from others that this occurred with them. Amazon customer service took care of this for me and I got the correct cable which is "Mediabridge Flex Series - High Speed Micro-HDMI to HDMI Cable with Ethernet 6 feet" on the Amazon.com site. Nobody can beat Amazon's Customer service! We love this camera! Takes great pictures and very easy to operate. Just point and shoot in auto mode and the camera makes you look professional! It does come with a lens cap and neck strap so you don't have to order those separately like I did. The description should tell you that but doesn't. Also, if you want a plug-in charger directly to the camera, there is a port for that on the camera, you will need to order separately the Kapaxen EH-67 Replacement AC Power Adapter / Charger for Nikon Coolpix L820 L810 L310 L120 L110 L105 L100 Digital Cameras. The charger that comes with this bundle is for the batteries that have to be removed from the camera to be charged. Camera is very stable in the 30X zoom mode so don't let that throw you. You CAN hold it still enough for a good picture. This camera is Awesome!

Reviews.Title: Cool pix L820
Reviews.Author: The Paddle Dude "Kayaker's Rule"
Reviews.Content: Excellent camera and accessories package.  The camera performs beyond my expectations and the clarity of the photos from the zoom function are great.  The zoom has dual controls, one by the shutter button and one on the side of the lens.  This convenience makes it easy to control the zoom without losing the focus.Access to the batteries and memory card is typical for most cameras these days and the flimsy door/catch leaves a lot to be desired.  It works fine but I'm apprehensive of the durability.Overall, I'm very pleased with the camera and all of the accessories.

Reviews.Title: Autofocus was slow and it did not take very good indoor photos
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey G Dalke
Reviews.Content: Autofocus was very slow. It was always trying to focus. It did not take very good indoor pictures even with the flash raised up.

Reviews.Title: Very Happy.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Very happy with the camera. Easy to learn and handle. Everything that came with the camera was better then what I expected and delighted with.

Reviews.Title: Superb Camera!!
Reviews.Author: Randolph L. Jones
Reviews.Content: We are very satisfied with our camera and accessories. We used it on our mini-vacation last week and it takes outstanding pictures and all of it's functions are easy to understand and utilize. Looking forward to many more "Nikon Moments" with our camera!!

Reviews.Title: Excellent package! It is worth every penny!
Reviews.Author: Diego Barrueco
Reviews.Content: I wasn't sure whether the L820 was the right camera to buy as I found many reviews stating that it presents focusing issues. I tested it myself indoor/outdoor, good/bad light, close/far targets and did not encounter any issue whatsoever. It has a fantastic zoom and impressive resolution. In addition, the accessories packed along with the camera are exactly what you need to cover any situation. I couldn't be happier. It is worth every penny I paid for it.

Reviews.Title: A satisfying Amazon customer experience
Reviews.Author: RP
Reviews.Content: The product was as described except for the hdmi cable and memory card wallet. I contacted Amazon and they were very apologetic and responded quickly. I really appreciate their attention to customer satisfaction. The camera works well without loss of features.  The bundle was well worth the cost. Amazon provided me with adequate refund to cover the items and my disappointment.Thanks Amazon for a real customer satisfying experience

Reviews.Title: A gift
Reviews.Author: Rosalinda Longoria
Reviews.Content: I purchased this as a gift for my boyfriend and he loves it. I have not had a chance to use it but from the feed back I get from him it was the best birthday gift ever.

Reviews.Title: Replacement camera
Reviews.Author: Nancy
Reviews.Content: We had our cameras stolen on a trip.  This is the same one we had before.Since it is so great, we had to continue with the same one!  Enjoy, because itis the perfect size and weight and the photos are super!!!(The kit is new to us but we love as well)

Reviews.Title: More than acceptable for basic needs.
Reviews.Author: Jerry
Reviews.Content: The camera, memory cards, battery charger, etc, are all more than acceptable for basic family needs. About the only negative is the flimsy tripod that shutters with every slight wind or vehicle driving by; so an upgrade to a sturdier tripod would have made the package a five.And Focus Camera that fulfilled the purchase came through with good service in replacing two damaged or missing items.

Reviews.Title: Happy camera user!
Reviews.Author: Mary
Reviews.Content: Nice camera! Used it for family photos and taking scenic pictures. The blackand white pictures with a splash of color is my favorite. Highly recommended!

Reviews.Title: Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Gail Walker
Reviews.Content: Easy to operate.  Not a lot of unnecessary buttons. Only had for a few weeks, but very satisfied. Makes great pictures.  Good value for the price.  Got extras that were not offered in the store.

Reviews.Title: CAMERA PACKAGE FANTASTIC
Reviews.Author: Georgeous
Reviews.Content: I would recommend this package to anyone who is looking for an easy-to-use camera that has excellent resolution,  zoom and wide-angle, and requires very little skill to use.  It comes with most everything you need to use the camera, including two different tripods, cleaning solution, and both a booklet and a DVD for instruction.  I am enjoying this selection very much!

Reviews.Title: HDMI cable provided doesn't fit on camera input
Reviews.Author: Rodrigo
Reviews.Content: The HDMI cable provided has MINI HDMI connection and the camera has MICRO HDMI input :(But, the camera is very nice and all other items included are ok.

Reviews.Title: It is a very good deal
Reviews.Author: Albert Kwong "im007rock"
Reviews.Content: This is a very good value pacage, It came with everything that was listed.I have tell my friends to get it.

Reviews.Title: The bundle is a great value.
Reviews.Author: PuzzleLover26
Reviews.Content: I knew I wanted the L820 for the awesome 30x zoom, and I'm so glad I went with the bundle. If I had purchased all the extras individually, it would have cost considerably more. The 32 gb card, full-size tripod and camera case would have made it worthwhile, so everything else is a bonus! The tabletop tripod is great for photographing items to sell on etsy or ebay.I am very happy with this product and it shipped and arrived right on time. I would recommend the bundle to anyone looking into buying the Coolpix L820.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Joelle Peterson
Reviews.Content: The delivery of my camera was fast and the package was as they said it would be, I am having fun with my camera and looking forward to taking many pictures with it.

Reviews.Title: Nikon Camera
Reviews.Author: J. richter "Happy Customer"
Reviews.Content: I am using it but I still have to learn some more about the new features on this camera .

Reviews.Title: No Problems
Reviews.Author: R. Conley
Reviews.Content: I have only had this product for a couple of weeks. But Focus Camera delivered everything as promised with no problems. Would definitely order from them again.

Reviews.Title: Can't complain
Reviews.Author: Monica Gordillo
Reviews.Content: Camera works perfectly! My only complaint would be that the additional products to this bundle are somewhat cheaply made (e.g. the batteries don't last very long and the plastic tripod is really light), but they all work like they're supposed to. Love my new camera.

Reviews.Title: Very good package
Reviews.Author: Margaret Cox
Reviews.Content: This package had everything that I needed for taking the pictures, transferring the pictures, editing the pictures. I am so pleased with the quality of pictures this Nikon takes, and it is very user friendly. Since I am not an expert photographer, I can take good pictures without having a lot of instruction.

Reviews.Title: GOODBYE
Reviews.Author: Linda E. Mccarthy
Reviews.Content: Packaging tells a lot about a mailer.  This camera and accessories were sent in a box 7x14x21 inches of cardboard loosely taped and loosely tossed in.  Rattle and roll.  No protection added.  Small contents falling out the bottom.  Camera,  tripod, etc. banging with the most disregard for fragility.  No writing on the container to warn of fragile contents.  I could not begin to assess if anything was broken so I took it to UPS but they would not accept it for return without padding (cost-$6.00).  They loaded total blame for your unprofessional handling completely on the sender.  I agree and will not do business without assurances that this service could not happen ever again.  No explanation can counter what I saw: my mind is made up.  I do not recommend shoddy work .

Reviews.Title: Satisfied
Reviews.Author: Tara
Reviews.Content: Thank you for this awesome piece of device. I love every piece of it. Thank you!! I have been able to take endless, manificent photos. Because of this device, I have several photo shoots in line which Im please to do with the camera. Made my hobbie even more fun.

Reviews.Title: This bundle covers it all.
Reviews.Author: Robert W. Green
Reviews.Content: I've gone through many cameras and have avoided Nikononly because of a few opinions. I have missed out.This camera does everything I needed it to do.As most reviews have stated, the con would be that there is no view finder.I have only used it for 6 weeks now but so far it has been great.It doesn't seem to eat up battery life either.I highly recommend this product and especially this bundle.

Reviews.Title: The best Camera I've had
Reviews.Author: TravelingArmyWife
Reviews.Content: Ive never owned a camera that cost more than $300. This one is the best for its price. I had tried it at best buy and loved it, but it cost the same as here without all the extras. This is the best deal.  All the extras were great! The pictures come out beautiful, the quality is amazing. Ever since i started using it i get rave reviews of my pictures.

Reviews.Title: great deal
Reviews.Author: Randall
Reviews.Content: This package comes with everything you need and then some. The camera works as expected, takes good pics for the price. We use the camera for sports pics and are very happy with the results, the case, card, cleaner, stand, and rechargeable batteries are great.

Reviews.Title: great pictures
Reviews.Author: W Fab
Reviews.Content: We bought this for my daughter for Christmas and I am amazed at the pictures it takes.  She has a real eye for photography and the camera just enhances that.  So glad we went with this camera.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the cost.
Reviews.Author: Debbie Beistel
Reviews.Content: Quality of pictures were really good. Lots of features and camera was really easy to use. Great first amateur camera.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Bill Layne
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a gift for my wife. She loves it and it takes excellent photos. They are very clear and crisp images.

Reviews.Title: Nikon coolpix L820 MP Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: vq
Reviews.Content: This was purchased as a gift. My daughter-in-law loves it. COMPLETELY SATISFIED. I would highly recommend this product. I am ordering one for myself.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Annie Jordan
Reviews.Content: This is such an amazing camera. I love the features and all the accessories are wonderful. It is definitely a steal!

Reviews.Title: Love this camera,  a tid bit on the expensive side though.
Reviews.Author: Jim Kashi
Reviews.Content: I like this camera,  was disappointed in the cost.  i expected more i guess out of a camera in this price range.  16 mp,  is great.  but there are better cameras out there with lower price tags,  I will probably be getting another nikon coolpix in the future but im staying with the older models which i feel are awesome cameras  same mp  but much lower price.

Reviews.Title: Coolpix L820 camera kit
Reviews.Author: Discover "Chuckie"
Reviews.Content: The Coolpix L820 camera package is very nice and every thing I expected it to be.  It performs well and hope to be able to enjoy it as time permits.

Reviews.Title: Christmas present
Reviews.Author: Robert Gendron
Reviews.Content: It was a Christmas present for my daughter and she has been using it every day. She is very happy with it

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: MMTNZ
Reviews.Content: Over all this is a great camera for the price! The zoom on it is great and it is not too heavy or big to carry around.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Gerry Eisert "gerry eisert"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for a friend and she  loved it ! It everything in the bundle that it takes to get started !

Reviews.Title: perfect gift
Reviews.Author: thomas greenleaf
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera with an amazing deal. Just have to make sure you have extra battery's when using it for more than 6 hours ... the rechargeable ones In this package seem to hold for longer. Over all unbeatable

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix Camera
Reviews.Author: Georgene McNeill
Reviews.Content: The camera is fabulous, This was a gift for my daughter. More than she expected. Beautiful picture, easy to operate.The camera was a lovely gift.

Reviews.Title: Amazing!
Reviews.Author: Samy
Reviews.Content: Sooo amazing! Te camera is fabulous and the accessories are great! The only thing I would change is I wish the tripod was taller than 50".  The camera surpassed my expectations though! I've already taken some amazing shots with it!

Reviews.Title: Ok but nothing great
Reviews.Author: John I Cardillo II
Reviews.Content: The camera works well but the rapid charger does not work and the tripod was damaged. Please notify us if this can be rectified. Thanks

Reviews.Title: Bought for a present
Reviews.Author: james
Reviews.Content: We bought this as a present for our granddaughter who is just now beginning to express an interest in photography.  She is absolutely thrilled with it and I believe it's a great starter for the someone who is just beginning to explore this field.

Reviews.Title: Great shots but with minor drawbacks
Reviews.Author: Cody
Reviews.Content: I love this little camera, and that's coming from a D-SLR user! Keep in mind, this is far from being a D-SLR, so don't buy with the same expectations in mind or you will be disappointed. Takes great shots from up-close to the great distances it zooms out to, almost with comparable quality to my D3200. Comfortable to hold and very easy to pick up and use. My only gripes would have to be that it doesn't have a viewfinder, so one is forced to use the LCD. Second, the batteries. Someone at Nikon must have been partying like it was 1999 and forgot...that it's not 1999. Instead of an efficient rechargeable battery pack, it packs AA's. Four of them. Last, no manual focus, but that's where I dropped the D-SLR expectation and outside of what I've just stated, I'm a very happy camper! All included accessories came in great condition, excluding what appeared to be a moldy bag, but after a run through the washing machine, looks good as new. SD card is a Sony 32 gig card, and the large tripod is very light, but ought to handle any non-extreme photoshoots. I highly recommend this as a bridge between point and shoot and D-SLR.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera and accessories
Reviews.Author: medicikimber
Reviews.Content: Excellent product-came with all described items. I feel it was a good value for the package deal. the item is a gift that I feel my daughter will enjoy for many years to come.

Reviews.Title: Great all in one camera
Reviews.Author: A
Reviews.Content: I love this camera.  I was using a Kodak point and shoot.  I was seeking a camera similar that was all in one.  30x zoom is great. This camera can pick up the dew drops to the ants crawling from 15 ft away.  Very little delay between shots.  Read the manuals and play with the shots to learn the camera.  Any novice can learn this camera.  If you do not read manual, it still takes great photos.  Night shots come out great (no flash).  Took picture of neighbors front porch light on next street from my back yard.  Again, great point and shoot camera, still shot, zoom shot.  Rarely miss a shot of my zippy jack russell and he is fast.

Reviews.Title: Loving it!
Reviews.Author: JacqueB63
Reviews.Content: We're loving the new Nikon Coolpix L820 camera package, the pictures are turning out good and getting better as we learn more of the features, its definitely a trial an error experience so the delete button comes in handy, but it's fairly easy to learn and a lot of fun.

Reviews.Title: Gave me a new lease on my creative life.
Reviews.Author: Linda Buchanan "Old Gamer"
Reviews.Content: We adore our new camera, this camera is perfect for me. I was an artist for most of my life until I developed an arthritic spine that has limited my ability to use my arms and hands to hold a brush, pencil or pen long enough to paint or draw. I had never considered photography, but this and Corel Paintshop Pro has given me back my creativity and without completely busting my budget. Love my new camera.

Reviews.Title: MY KIND OF CAMERA
Reviews.Author: jim cockrum
Reviews.Content: PERSONAL EXPERIENCE RECOMMENDS IT TO ME  I TAKE IT EVERYWHERE AND HAVE A GREAT TIME  BUY ONE TODAY AND ENJOY IT

Reviews.Title: Great Buy
Reviews.Author: nigel baker
Reviews.Content: I must the camera is pretty decent, and the additional accessories were a great deal. I am still getting use to my new camera, but it has been a good experience, so far.

Reviews.Title: It worked great.
Reviews.Author: Diane Burgess
Reviews.Content: The camera served it's purpose for the price. It took really nice pictures. Zoom worked very well. The bag smelled musty and the extra recharable batteries didn't work.Overall, I was satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Not what I expected.
Reviews.Author: Donna Murray
Reviews.Content: I returned this item because I had concerns about the durability of the camera. The battery compartment is made of plastic and difficult to close.

Reviews.Title: Rate this packaging:Amazon.com/packaging  (look familiar?)
Reviews.Author: m mcdaniel
Reviews.Content: Nikon is my favorite camera. This will be my 2nd Coolpix purchase.  I  purchasedthis right before the ice storm hit the mid west. I have Amazon Prime, but I didn'treceive my UPS delivery until 7 days later.  I tracked the package online. Every day UPS loaded it and brought it into town,but  they first made their current deliveries and later in the day played catch up forseveral hours. This method took them 7 days to make the deliveries they should havemade during  a 2 day ice storm. So 7 days later, my package, crushed and abused,was tossed onto my porch. The poor UPS guy saw me watching  him as he threw it!But I didn't care, because I knew how well Amazon packed things.  Unfortunately, Focus Camera packaged this order. They tossed the boxed cameraand the additional 11 items in a large shipping box without any packing to secureany of it, and sent it off.  No bubble wrap like Amazon uses; no wadded upnewspapers; no cat litter; no used diapers; Nothin!  So for 7 days my camera was loaded off and on the UPS truck.  It sat at thebottom of the pile and traveled over icy roads; roads that had been plowed.  Plowsthat had created huge piles of ice at various intersections, parking lots anddriveways.  When I opened that box and saw the packing job that Focus Camera had done,my thought was,  "Send it back. Even if the camera works today, it might not work a month fromnow after  what it's been through."  I never even opened the camera box to see what kind of shape the camera wasin. I already knew what it had been through. The camera box itself was so beat upthat I could not read some of the print on it. The black ink (the color of the box) hadrubbed off and the box appeared white in areas. I mean this box had taken abeating. And my camera was inside of it.  A brand new camera. No way. And I amnot blaming UPS. It is not their fault  we had an ice storm. It is Focus Camera's faultfor not securing the items within the box they sent me.  So I taped it back up, and prepared to send it back.I looked at my order and realized this was not a Prime order. My mistake. I wasalways told by my friends that I could trust the little blue Prime logo next to anorder and to always use it. This did not have it.  If I order a bundle in the future and it IS Prime, I  hope I do notsee the words Focus Camera as the Seller because I won't buy it. The outer shipping box didn't come from Amazon. It came from Focus Cameraaccording to the return address label. At the bottom of the outer box there was astamp in black ink that said"Amazon.com\packaging  Rate this packaging"In other words, since it did not originate with Amazon, they want feed back to letthem know the condition of the packaging when it arrived. I think everyone hereneeds to let them know. The whole order started at Focus Camera, andnever passed through the hands of anyone at Amazon.So if you are unhappy with this bundle, or Focus Camera, let Amazon know. Theydon''t like to represent themselves as shoddy, untrustworthy, unreliable, and careless.But that is the message I received from this order.I am glad that I can depend on Amazon to refund my money.maidensolo

Reviews.Title: Item was dented when shipped
Reviews.Author: Michael
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my son for Christmas, and when he opened the camera on the lens wouldn't open. I tried to return and the company said it wouldn't refund as the item was dropped.  I watched my son open the camera and it wasn't droppedI wouldn't do business with them again, also Amazon didn't help after multiple emails, chats and calls!

Reviews.Title: Coolpix L820, Point and Shoot
Reviews.Author: E. Myhre "Lil_Dog"
Reviews.Content: As a former SLR user, I looked around for a simple point and shoot with a medium zoom lens.I downloaded several manuals and read them prior to ordering, I do this with the items I'm looking at to facilitate choosing and inevitably lessen the learning curve when I receive it.The camera and accessories arrived quickly and I was up and shooting in no time.This camera is more point and shoot than is apparent, and this should be kept in mind or you will surely be disappointed. To get the most out of this camera (or anything), a body needs to read the manual, (RTFM).

Reviews.Title: items missing
Reviews.Author: geoff
Reviews.Content: The camera is as expected but there were several items missing or incorrect from the shipment. the cables that were included were not the right ones. the small flexible table top tripod was missing.  The box that contained the accessory kit was missing the memory card case.  all in all  the camera does as it is suppose to and I repacked everything before giving this as a birthday present. I was not able to return everything or get the incorrect items replaced due to time constraints. I will not be doing business with this company ever again.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Abby Puterbaugh
Reviews.Content: This is a great package! I don't know much about cameras, but I can say this one is what I expected. Very nice, and to get everything to go with it all in one package is pretty awesome! The camera takes great pictures as well, clear high quality pictures!

Reviews.Title: Haven't used yet but appears to be okay
Reviews.Author: Linda Sobotka
Reviews.Content: I can not fairly write a review becasue it was prurchased as a christmas gift and it has not been opened or used yet. Howevr, there was one small proble tht occured during shipping.  The lenscleaning solution leaked all oer the other contents that were in the smae package.  Luckily nothing wa ruined but I now only have a half bottle of solution.

Reviews.Title: Nikon COOLPIX L820 Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Len Cline
Reviews.Content: I want to purchase this camera.  I cannot find anywhereif this camera has a remote or wire plug in button forshutter release.  Please let me know if it has either or both.Thanks.

ProductInfo.Features:
This Kit includes 13 items all with USA Warranty and manufacturer's supplied accessories
Nikon COOLPIX L820 16 MP Digital Camera with 30x Zoom and Full HD 1080p videos (Black)
32 Gigabyte SDHC Secure Digital Memory Card - Secure Digital USB Card Reader - Universal Memory Card Wallet - Pack of LCD Screen Protectors
4 Rechargeable AA 2700 Mah Nimh Batteries with AC/DC Rapid Battery Charger - 2 (two) 4 Slot Battery Tube Holders - Protective Digital Camera Carrying Case w/ Pockets & Strap
Full Size 50" Tripod W/Case - Flexible Legged Mini Table Tripod - Lens Care & Cleaning Kit - HDMI Cable for direct connection to HDTV -  BONUS!! FREE 25 Quality Prints (promo code# on invoice)
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon COOLPIX L820 16 MP Digital Camera with 30x Zoom (Black) + 4 AA Batteries with AC/DC Rapid Charger + 11pc Bundle 32GB Deluxe Accessory Kit
